message: This is a fair deal, Bob. I'm willing to split the money 90/10 in your favor since you're taking a bigger hit from inflation.
Considering the inflation, I think 60/40 is a more reasonable split.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. 65/35 is still a fair split considering the inflation we're both facing.
Considering the significant hit I'm taking from inflation, I'm willing to adjust slightly from my previous offer, hoping we can meet in the middle and conclude this deal.
